title: Ep. 546 - The Mask Slips
description:
The unmasking of Mike Flynn in the last days of the Obama administration is the most egregious political scandal of our lifetimes, and we’ve just learned it goes all the way up to Joe Biden. Maybe even higher. Meanwhile, the new masking order in LA caps off the most arbitrary political power grab in our lifetimes. Luckily President Trump is starting to break with his expert doctor dictators. Then, another rough interview for Joe Biden, a big Republican win in California, and finally the Mailbag!

Expert Ownership Podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/expert-ownership-podcast/id1506068263

If you like The Michael Knowles Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: KNOWLES and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/Knowles
